Free Runner Armor

Free Runner Armor is the class-specific armor obtained by using an Armor Kit on any regular armor for the Free Runner subclass in Remixed Dungeon.

Acquisition

  • Use an Armor Kit on any regular armor while playing as a Rogue who has chosen the Free Runner subclass
  • Armor Kit can be obtained by defeating the King boss in the City level
  • Transforms the base armor into Free Runner Armor with special properties
  • Armor Kit action: “APPLY” (ArmorKit_ACAplly)

Special Properties

  • Inherits all properties of Rogue Armor (Teleport ability)
  • Exclusive to the Free Runner subclass - cannot be equipped if not the Free Runner subclass
  • Retains the defensive rating (DR) and strength requirement (STR) of the original armor
  • Cannot be upgraded further

Usage

  • Essential armor for maximizing the effectiveness of the Free Runner subclass
  • Should be crafted as soon as possible after choosing the Free Runner subclass
  • Allows full utilization of subclass abilities
  • Requires 1/3 of max skill points + 1 to activate special ability when equipped

Special Ability: Teleport

  • Allows teleporting to a targeted location within line of sight
  • Requires sufficient skill points to activate (1/3 of max skill points + 1)
  • Can be used to escape dangerous situations or reposition for attacks
  • Does not trigger traps or other location-based effects during teleport
  • Only available when armor is equipped

Notes

  • Part of the subclass identity system in Remixed Dungeon
  • Class armors represent the unique nature of each subclass
  • Cannot be worn by characters who haven't unlocked the appropriate subclass
  • Inherits the base Rogue armor special ability

Content Verification

  • Information source: Java Class com.watabou.pixeldungeon.items.armor.FreeRunnerArmor
  • Stats verification: FreeRunnerArmor extends RogueArmor which extends ClassArmor
  • Effect descriptions source: Code analysis and string resources
  • Last updated: Based on Remixed Dungeon source code
  • Source code: FreeRunnerArmor.java
